body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer support. My name is Willie Simmons and I am with DataWorks Solutions. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Marie Turner.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marie. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am having an issue with managing my data at the Car Dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five two zero one three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Marie. I will look into the data management issue for you. Is there anything else you would like to share?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that is all. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Marie. Thank you for reaching out to us. Have a great day!
